description: Describes an item in Backpack Hero

name.title: Modpack Name
name.description: Name of Modpack. This gets displayed in the modpack menu and on the item cards.

description.title: Description
description.description: Custom description to be displayed in the modpack menu.

author.title: Modpack Author
author.description: Author of the modpack. Gets displayed in the modpack menu.

version.title: Modpack Version
version.description: Version number of the modpack. Gets displayed in the modpack menu. Format should be something like this: `1.0.0`

website.title: URL
website.description: A website, forum, discord server associated with the modpack. If set, modpack gets a 'Website' button on its entry in the modpack menu. Must be valid HTTP(S) URL
